message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider a counteroffer of $12,000?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is below the minimum I can accept for this product.  It holds significant value and I'm confident it can make a real difference for you. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand Alice, but given my current budget constraints, I can only consider offers within my specified limit. Would you be willing to lower the price to $12,500?
